greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Run lengths in infinite binary Champernowne string (A030190) formed by concatenation of 0, 1, 2 ... in base 2.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
example: The string starts with 011011100101110111... (concatenation of 0, 1, 10, 11, 100, 101, 110, 111, ...) so initial runs are 1, 2, 1, 3, ...
results.author: Helge Robitzsch (hrobi(AT)math.uni-goettingen.de), Jul 27 2000
ext: Edited by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 26 2010
Data corrected for n > 44 by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 26 2013
